Text: Is this update still having Super Potato Boy as a default character?

Am I stupid or what? I extracted each "sub-archive" from each archive (don't see the point of that double-archiving, but ok), extracted the exe file, chose the destination folder an when I click Supermeatbo.exe i got this message: Runtime error! C:\Program Files, bla bla... This application has requested the Runtime to terminate in an unusual way. Please contact the bla bla...
I have Windows 7 64bit, tried compatibilty mode, still the same.
Alright, looks like I got it. Gotta run it in 640x480 resolution (right-click on the exe file, then properties, then compatibility, there it is). That's for Windows 7 users.
Works on my win7 HP mini machine. Didn't even need to set a compatibility mode. just extract and run.

It doesn't work on windows xp sp3.
It hangs right after I start the game.
